amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1019 which requires the Secretary of State to submit to Congress a report describing the possibility of providing consular and visa services at the United States Office Prisitna, Kosovo to residents of Kosova.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in part B of House Report 109-175 which strikes section 1019 of the bill, relating to consular and visa services in Pristina, Kosova.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A032) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Franks (AZ).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A032) Failed by voice vote.
